Class vrml.external.Browser 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class vrml.external.Browser 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----vrml.external.Browser
public class Browser
extends Object
VRML External Interface class for blaxxunCC3D control

For example: 
 
   Browser = Browser.getBrowser(handleOfControl);

Browser(IblaxxunCC3D)

FreeControls()
free the control object (blaxxunCC3D)

Netscape : not supported

SetControl(Object, Applet)
set the control object (blaxxunCC3D) used for Internet Explorer : input is handle to blaxxunCC3D Active X Control

Netscape : not supported

addNode(Node)
add node as new top-level scene node (blaxxunCC3D)
addRoute(Node, String, Node, String)
Add a route between the specified eventOut and eventIn of the given nodes
adviseOnUrlChanged(EventOutObserver, Object)
set EventOutObserver for url changed event (blaxxunCC3D)

call back will be called whenever scene download or new scene will be loaded internally eventype is SFString, containing the URL

beginUpdate()
notify browser of a batch of EAI operations requiring no temporay update (blaxxunCC3D)

a call of beginUpdate must be followed by endUpdate, begin/end Updatecalls can be nested

createNode(String)
create a node of the given classname or prototype name (blaxxunCC3D)

simpler alternative for createVrmlFromString(" name {} ")

createVrmlFromString(String)
Parse STRING into a VRML scene and return the list of root nodes for the resulting scene
createVrmlFromURL(String[], Node, String)
Tells the browser to load a VRML scene from the passed URL or URLs.
deleteRoute(Node, String, Node, String)
Delete a route between the specified eventOut and eventIn of the given nodes
endUpdate()
end batch of EAI operations (blaxxunCC3D)
getBrowser(Applet)
return an instance of the Browser class

Netscape : This returns the first embedded plugin in the current frame.

IE : call setControl(handleOfVrmlControl) first or use getBrowser(handleOfVrmlControl)

getBrowser(Applet, String, int)
return an instance of the Browser class

Netscape : If frameName is NULL, current frame is assumed.

IE : call setControl(handleOfVrmlControl)

or blaxxunCC3DControl.SetControl(ctrlObject,applet) first

or use simply getBrowser(handleOfVrmlControl)

getBrowser(Object)
return an instance of the Browser class, used for Internet Explorer : input is handle to blaxxunCC3D Active X Control

Netscape : not supported

getCollisionDetection()
get state of viewers collisionDetection switch (blaxxunCC3D)
getCurrentFrameRate()
Get the current frame rate of the browser, or 0.0 if not available
getCurrentSpeed()
Get the current velocity of the bound viewpoint in meters/sec, if available, or 0.0 if not
getHeadlight()
get state of viewers headlight switch (blaxxunCC3D)
getName()
Get the "name" of the VRML browser (browser-specific)
getNode(String)
Get a DEFed node by name.
getVersion()
Get the "version" of the VRML browser (browser-specific)
getViewerMode()
Get the name of current navigation mode (blaxxunCC3D)
getViewpoint()
get name of currently bound viewpoint (blaxxunCC3D)
getWorld()
returns top level blaxxunCC3D Scene group node, holding the VRML world (blaxxunCC3D)

get the eventout "children" to acess all top level nodes

getWorldURL()
Get the URL for the root of the current world, or an empty string if not available
getanimateAllViewpoints()
get state of viewers animateAllViewpoints switch (blaxxunCC3D)
loadURL(String[], String[])
Load the given URL with the passed parameters (as described in the Anchor node)
removeNode(Node)
remove node from top-level scene node (blaxxunCC3D)

true: node was a top level node, and has been removed

replaceWorld(Node[])
Replace the current world with the passed array of nodes
replaceWorld(Node)
Replace the current world with the passed node optimized case, where node is a "Scene" node (blaxxunCC3D)
saveViewpoint(String)
save viewpoint (blaxxunCC3D)
saveWorld(String)
save the world to a local file (blaxxunCC3D)
setAnimateAllViewpoints(boolean)
set state of viewers animateAllViewpoints switch (blaxxunCC3D)
setCollisionDetection(boolean)
set state of viewers collisionDetection switch (blaxxunCC3D)
setDescription(String)
Set the description of the current world in a browser-specific manner.
setHeadlight(boolean)
set state of viewers headlight switch (blaxxunCC3D)
setNextViewpoint()
jump to next viewpoint (blaxxunCC3D)
setNodeName(Node, String)
set name of node to newName (blaxxunCC3D)

node will be availabe afterwards to getNode(newName) application is responsible, that node is or will be part of the current scene

setPrevViewpoint()
jump to prev viewpoint (blaxxunCC3D)
setTimerInterval(int)
set browser timer animation cycle in milliSeconds (blaxxunCC3D)

result is old timerInterval usefull to reduce systemload if greater numbers 200 - 500 or get more frequent updates of lower numbers 10 ..

setViewerMode(String)
set name of current navigation mode (walk, examine, fly ...) (blaxxunCC3D)
setViewpoint(String)
set new viewpoint by string (blaxxunCC3D)

Browser 
  public Browser(IblaxxunCC3D bxCtrl)

getName 
  public String getName()
Get the "name" of the VRML browser (browser-specific)
Returns:
name of the browser "blaxxunCC3D" for blaxxunCC3D
getVersion 
  public String getVersion()
Get the "version" of the VRML browser (browser-specific)
Returns:
version of the browser
getCurrentSpeed 
  public float getCurrentSpeed()
Get the current velocity of the bound viewpoint in meters/sec, if available, or 0.0 if not
Returns:
current speed
getCurrentFrameRate 
  public float getCurrentFrameRate()
Get the current frame rate of the browser, or 0.0 if not available
Returns:
current frame rate
getWorldURL 
  public String getWorldURL()
Get the URL for the root of the current world, or an empty string if not available
Returns:
url
replaceWorld 
  public void replaceWorld(Node nodes[]) throws IllegalArgumentException
Replace the current world with the passed array of nodes
Parameters:
nodes - The array of nodes
Returns:
url
loadURL 
  public void loadURL(String url[],
                      String parameter[])
Load the given URL with the passed parameters (as described in the Anchor node)
Parameters:
url - The array of urls (blaxxunCC3D uses only the element at index 0
parameter - The array of params
setDescription 
  public void setDescription(String description)
Set the description of the current world in a browser-specific manner. To clear the description, pass an empty string as argumentLoad the given URL with the passed parameters (as described in the Anchor node)
Parameters:
description - the string, will be displayed in status line of browser
createVrmlFromString 
  public Node[] createVrmlFromString(String vrmlSyntax) throws InvalidVrmlException
Parse STRING into a VRML scene and return the list of root nodes for the resulting scene
Parameters:
vrmlSyntax - string with a valid vrml syntax string (without #VRML header)
Returns:
an array of nodes, if the length is 0 this also means a syntax error or a bad string
createVrmlFromURL 
  public void createVrmlFromURL(String url[],
                                Node node,
                                String event)
Tells the browser to load a VRML scene from the passed URL or URLs. After the scene is loaded, an event is sent to the MFNode eventIn in node NODE named by the EVENT argument
Parameters:
url - url to be loaded
node - node with MFNode event in
eventName - Event in of node e.g. "addChildren" or "set_children"
getNode 
  public Node getNode(String name) throws InvalidNodeException
Get a DEFed node by name. Nodes given names in the root scene graph must be made available to this method. DEFed nodes in inlines, as well as DEFed nodes returned from createVrmlFromString/URL, may or may not be made available to this method, depending on the browser's implementation
Parameters:
name - node name
Returns:
node if found or exception if node is not present
addRoute 
  public void addRoute(Node fromNode,
                       String fromEventOut,
                       Node toNode,
                       String toEventIn) throws IllegalArgumentException
Add a route between the specified eventOut and eventIn of the given nodes
Parameters:
fromNode - source node
fromEventOut - event out name eg. "fraction_changed"
toNode - destination node
toEventIn - event int name eg. "set_fraction"
deleteRoute 
  public void deleteRoute(Node fromNode,
                          String fromEventOut,
                          Node toNode,
                          String toEventIn) throws IllegalArgumentException
Delete a route between the specified eventOut and eventIn of the given nodes
Parameters:
fromNode - source node
fromEventOut - event out name eg. "fraction_changed"
toNode - destination node
toEventIn - event int name eg. "set_fraction"
getBrowser 
  public static Browser getBrowser(Applet pApplet)
return an instance of the Browser class

Netscape : This returns the first embedded plugin in the current frame.

IE : call setControl(handleOfVrmlControl) first or use getBrowser(handleOfVrmlControl)

getBrowser 
  public static Browser getBrowser(Applet pApplet,
                                   String frameName,
                                   int index)
return an instance of the Browser class

Netscape : If frameName is NULL, current frame is assumed.

IE : call setControl(handleOfVrmlControl)

or blaxxunCC3DControl.SetControl(ctrlObject,applet) first

or use simply getBrowser(handleOfVrmlControl)

getBrowser 
  public static Browser getBrowser(Object bxCtrl)
return an instance of the Browser class, used for Internet Explorer : input is handle to blaxxunCC3D Active X Control

Netscape : not supported

Parameters:
bxCtrl - handle of blaxxunCC3D active X control passed via the VBScript onLoad function

SetControl 
  public static void SetControl(Object bxCtrl,
                                Applet pApplet)
set the control object (blaxxunCC3D) used for Internet Explorer : input is handle to blaxxunCC3D Active X Control

Netscape : not supported

Parameters:
bxCtrl - handle of blaxxunCC3D active X control passed via the VBScript onLoad function

pApplet - the applet bxCtrl is associated with
FreeControls 
  public static void FreeControls()
free the control object (blaxxunCC3D)

Netscape : not supported

viewpointName - viewpoint name string

save viewpoint (blaxxunCC3D)
Parameters:
viewpointName, - if not node not present, new Viewpoint will be created

setNextViewpoint 
  public void setNextViewpoint()
jump to next viewpoint (blaxxunCC3D)
setPrevViewpoint 
  public void setPrevViewpoint()
jump to prev viewpoint (blaxxunCC3D)
beginUpdate 
  public void beginUpdate()
notify browser of a batch of EAI operations requiring no temporay update (blaxxunCC3D)

a call of beginUpdate must be followed by endUpdate, begin/end Updatecalls can be nested

endUpdate 
  public void endUpdate()
end batch of EAI operations (blaxxunCC3D)
setTimerInterval 
  public int setTimerInterval(int milliSeconds)
set browser timer animation cycle in milliSeconds (blaxxunCC3D)

result is old timerInterval usefull to reduce systemload if greater numbers 200 - 500 or get more frequent updates of lower numbers 10 .. 100

addNode 
  public void addNode(Node newNode) throws IllegalArgumentException
add node as new top-level scene node (blaxxunCC3D)
removeNode 
  public boolean removeNode(Node removeNode) throws IllegalArgumentException
remove node from top-level scene node (blaxxunCC3D)

true: node was a top level node, and has been removed

createNode 
  public Node createNode(String name) throws InvalidNodeException
create a node of the given classname or prototype name (blaxxunCC3D)

simpler alternative for createVrmlFromString(" name {} ")

setNodeName 
  public void setNodeName(Node newNode,
                          String newName) throws IllegalArgumentException
set name of node to newName (blaxxunCC3D)

node will be availabe afterwards to getNode(newName) application is responsible, that node is or will be part of the current scene

getWorld 
  public Node getWorld() throws InvalidNodeException
returns top level blaxxunCC3D Scene group node, holding the VRML world (blaxxunCC3D)

get the eventout "children" to acess all top level nodes

replaceWorld 
  public void replaceWorld(Node node) throws IllegalArgumentException
Replace the current world with the passed node optimized case, where node is a "Scene" node (blaxxunCC3D)
adviseOnUrlChanged 
  public EventOut adviseOnUrlChanged(EventOutObserver observer,
                                     Object userData)
set EventOutObserver for url changed event (blaxxunCC3D)

call back will be called whenever scene download or new scene will be loaded internally eventype is SFString, containing the URL

saveWorld 
  public boolean saveWorld(String fileName)
save the world to a local file (blaxxunCC3D)
Parameters:
fileName - file name of local file
